Text: Cadence announces that at the Annual General Meeting of the Company held today, all resolutions put to shareholders were duly passed. Consequently, the share capital consolidation on a 1 for 100 basis will come into effect at 8am on 23rd September 2019 (Admission).
Cause: Cadence announces that at the Annual General Meeting of the Company held today, all resolutions put to shareholders were duly passed.
Effect: Consequently, the share capital consolidation on a 1 for 100 basis will come into effect at 8am on 23rd September 2019 (Admission).
Sentence: <e1>Cadence announces that at the Annual General Meeting of the Company held today, all resolutions put to shareholders were duly passed.</e1> <e2>Consequently, the share capital consolidation on a 1 for 100 basis will come into effect at 8am on 23rd September 2019 (Admission).</e2>
